item.title: By: paul smith
item.dc:creator: paul smith
item.description: I'm very happy to hear you are retiring - about time! I have been enjoying mine since 2018. The best job I ever had. Would be good to see you, I'm in Europe for a few months this year.
item.content:encoded: I’m very happy to hear you are retiring – about time! I have been enjoying mine since 2018. The best job I ever had. Would be good to see you, I’m in Europe for a few months this year.

item.title: By: lievenlb
item.dc:creator: lievenlb
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lievenlebruyn.github.io/neverendingbooks/stella-maris-cormac-mccarthy/#comment-150">paul smith</a>.
Hi Paul, perhaps you should restart your blog? Enjoy your retirement (mine will start Oct 1st...).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to paul smith.

Hi Paul, perhaps you should restart your blog?
Enjoy your retirement (mine will start Oct 1st…).

item.title: By: paul smith
item.dc:creator: paul smith
item.description:
You should know about this wine - it's pretty good. https://www.northstarwinery.com/2017-stella-maris-red-wine/5637323839.p
greetings from Malaga
